Class CSS Functionality
.width-full width: 100% Full width of block
.float-left float: left; block float to the left
.float-right float: right; block float to the right
.left-justified left: 0 Position left
.right-justified right: 0 Position right
.clear clear: both clear floating
.display-block display: block block displayed as block
.display-inline display: inline block displayed inline
.display-inline-block display: inline-block block displayed inline-block
.display-table display: table block displayed as table
.display-table-cell display: table-cell block displayed as cell
.relative position: relative Position relative
.absolute position: absolute Position absolute
.centered margin-left/right: auto; Centered position, use with .display-block on inline elements
.hidden display: none Hides content
.invisible visibility: hidden Visually hidden, but still takes up space
.border-bottom border: 1px solid #EEEEEE Assigns border to bottom of item
.vertical-center, .vertical-center-abs position: relative
top: 50%
transform: translateY(-50%);		 Content centered vertically, optionally using position: absolute
.font-underline text-decoration: underline Underline
.text-left text-align: left Align text to the left
.text-center text-align: center
Center the text
.text-right text-align: right
Align text to the right
.clickable cursor: pointer Converts cursor to pointer

Text colors

Class CSS Functionality
.text-white color: #fff Only with dark backgrounds
.text-black color: #333 Black color
.text-business-blue color: #00629b Blue color (primary)
.text-teal color: #18b9a0 Teal color (primary)
.text-charcoal color: #333 Charcoal (dark gray) color (primary)
.text-gold color: #fdaa18 Gold color (primary)
.text-dust color: #f1f5f8 Dust/off-white color
.text-med-gray color: ##919191 Medium gray color
.text-gray color: #535353 Gray color
.text-yellow color: #FAA41A Yellow color
.text-blue-secondary color: #0073ae Blue color
.text-bright-blue color: #7ce5ff Bright blue color
.text-deep-blue color: #083e62 Deep blue color
.text-lt-blue color: #d5f6ff Light blue color
.text-mustard color: #da8d00 Mustard (dark yellow) color
.text-orange color: #f66200 Orange color
.text-burnt-orange color: #dd5800 Burnt (dark) orange color
.text-lt-gray color: #eeeeee Light gray color
.text-med-blue color: #1693c3 Medium blue color
.text-charcoal color: #333 Charcoal color
.text-business-blue color: #00629b "Business Blue" color
.text-teal color: #18b9a0 teal color
.text-yellow color: #ffbc00 yellow color
.text-mustard color: #da8d00 Mustard color

Background colors

Class CSS Functionality
.bg-white background-color: #ffffff White background color
.bg-transparent-white background: rgba(255,255,255,0.85)
Transparent white background
.bg-deep-blue background-color: #003057 Deep blue background color
.bg-medium-blue background-color: #004E7D Medium blue background color
.bg-light-blue background-color: #0077BC Light blue background color
.bg-light-gray background-color: #e5e3e3 Light gray background color
.bg-gray background-color: #808285 Gray background color
.bg-dark-gray background-color: #333333 Dark gray background color
.bg-teal background-color: #009E8C Teal background color
.bg-yellow background-color: #FAA41A Yellow background color
.bg-gradient-primary background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #083e60 0%, #0b7ac0 100%) Gradiated blue background color
.bg-gradient-secondary background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #d4d3d3 0%,#f1f1f1 100%) Gradiated gray background color
.bg-gradient-tertiary background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #E4E4E4 0%,#9A9B9F 100%) Gradiated gray background color

Header Colors

Class CSS Functionality
.business-blue-head border-top: 8px solid #00629B Business Blue Head Top Border
.gold-head border-top: 8px solid #FDAA18 Gold Head Top Border
.teal-head border-top: 8px solid #18B9A0 Teal Head Top Border
.charcoal-head border-top: 8px solid #333333 Charcoal Head Top Border
.dust-head border-top: 8px solid #F1F5F8 Dust Head Top Border
.yellow-head border-top: 8px solid #FFBC00 Yellow Head Top Border
.blue-head border-top: 8px solid #0073AE Blue Head Top Border
.gray-head border-top: 8px solid #535353 Gray Head Top Border
.med-gray-head border-top: 8px solid #919194 Medium Gray Head Top Border
.bright-blue-head border-top: 8px solid #7CE5FF Bright Blue Head Top Border
.deep-blue-head border-top: 8px solid #003057 Deep Blue Head Top Border
.lt-blue-head border-top: 8px solid #D5F6FF Light Blue Head Top Border
.musard-head border-top: 8px solid #DA8D00 Mustard Head Top Border
.orange-head border-top: 8px solid #F66200 Orange Head Top Border
.lt-gray-head border-top: 8px solid #EEEEEE Light Gray Head Top Border
.burnt-orange-head border-top: 8px solid #DD5800 Burnt Orange Head Top Border
.med-blue-head border-top: 8px solid #1693C3 Med Blue Head Top Border
